heading: Today
text: Morning clouds north, a few localized snow showers, then breaks of afternoon sun.  Sun mixing with periods of clouds south.  Highs 10 to 15 north, 15 to 20 south.  Winds light, becoming northwest near 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Periods of clouds, more so in the northern mountains.  A few scattered snow showers north.  Lows 5 below to 5 above.  Winds northwest near 10 mph, diminishing to light.

heading: Thursday
text: Variable clouds and sun, more sun in southern valleys.  Highs 10 to 20 north to south.  Winds becoming northwest near 10 mph.
